meanings.definition: (of a chemical reaction) accompanied by or requiring the absorption of heat
meanings.sent1: The endothermic reaction felt cold to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The endothermic reaction needed heat to happen.
meanings.sent3: The endothermic reaction was like a chilly surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The endothermic reaction was a heat vampire, sucking warmth away.
meanings.sent5: The endothermic reaction was like a frozen puzzle, needing heat to solve.

meanings.definition: (of an organism) generating heat to maintain body temperature
meanings.sent1: The endothermic animal stayed warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The endothermic creature produced its own heat.
meanings.sent3: The endothermic organism was like a cozy heater on a cold day.
meanings.sent4: The endothermic being was a walking furnace, radiating warmth.
meanings.sent5: The endothermic creature was a living blanket, keeping itself toasty.
